jimboefx.name: James Montgomery
jimboefx.bio: A passionate and sometimes obsessive problem solver who rants about predictable failures. Hates exceptions. Often found near coffee.

stejoh.name: Steven Johnston
stejoh.bio: Tech lover and scripting addict. Focused on virtualisation, storage and data centre networking solutions. VMware / Cisco / EMC.

alanmcburney.name: Alan McBurney
alanmcburney.bio: Solutions Architect @Novosco. Passionate about technology, delivering Microsoft centric solutions with emphasis on Lync, Exchange, PowerShell and Infrastructure.

crod.name: Cláudio Rodrigues
crod.bio: TS, Citrix and VDI über geek. MVP and CTP, known in the industry for calling BS on the spot. Loves going for long drives on his amazing cars.

shane_bre.name: Shane Brennan
shane_bre.bio: A tangible trouble-shooter in a virtual space. Computers come first, but food is always a temptation. If not behind the keyboard, check the kitchen. Main IT focus is VDI / application virtualisation / server virtualisation.

rainco.name: Colin Rainey
rainco.bio: Citrix Techie and IT enthusiast, delving into MDM and has been known to listen to the odd 80’s tune.

MALCONFIGURED.name: Mal Toner
MALCONFIGURED.bio: Experienced (yes - that means grey haired) Solution Architect with a focus on Cloud Infrastructure

novoscotechblog.name: John Lennon
novoscotechblog.bio: Sales Director and sometimes frustrated engineer, focused on virtualisation, storage and datacentre technologies.
